price: This is how We punished them for their ingratitude; would We punish anyone except those who are utterly ungrateful?
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
